verses.name: Daniel 6:1
verses.text: It pleased Darius to set over the kingdom an hundred and twenty princes, which should be over the whole kingdom;

verses.name: Daniel 6:2
verses.text: And over these three presidents; of whom Daniel was first: that the princes might give accounts unto them, and the king should have no damage.

verses.name: Daniel 6:3
verses.text: Then this Daniel was preferred above the presidents and princes, because an excellent spirit was in him; and the king thought to set him over the whole realm.
